backend/main.mo: Implements access-controlled user profiles and game progress storage using Map, enforcing permissions for viewing and saving data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries of key frontend files, including styling, state, story content, and challenge implementations.
frontend/index.css: Defines global CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH values and applies Tailwind base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app with a placeholder title tag.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile setup, game state transitions, and theme provider setup.
frontend/src/components/Auth/LoginButton: Sign-in/sign-out button wired to Internet Identity with loading states and React Query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/Auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time users to enter and save a fighter name with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders optional background images with dark overlays and positions game content above them.
frontend/src/components/Hud.tsx: HUD component displaying current round, chapter title, and player stats using styled badges and cards.
frontend/src/components/SaveLoadPanel.ts: UI panel enabling authenticated users to save and load game progress to backend, assembling objective and state data.
frontend/src/game/challenges/BrawlChalle: Interactive combat mini‑game with timed enemy attacks, player moves, combos, and scoring that returns a challenge result.
frontend/src/game/challenges/FocusChalle: 10‑second click‑based challenge tracking clicks and time, scoring based on performance before returning a result.
frontend/src/game/challenges/TacticsChal: Choice‑based tactical risk–reward challenge that randomly determines success and returns rewards accordingly.
frontend/src/game/challenges/types.ts: Defines shared challenge interfaces including result shape and completion callback props.
frontend/src/game/challenges/WisdomChall: Single‑question moral reasoning challenge awarding rewards based on whether the chosen answer is wise.
frontend/src/game/state/gameState.ts: Defines game state structure, helpers for creating/loading game data, managing chapters, and determining mission progress.
frontend/src/game/state/reducer.ts: Reducer updating game state for choices, challenges, narrative progression, and story objectives with clamped stat changes.
frontend/src/game/story/chapters.ts: Defines story chapter and choice interfaces and exports three narrative chapters with choices and challenge types.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls for profile and progress loading/saving using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom gritty-themed CSS variables and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/screens/ChapterScreen.tsx: Renders a chapter view with narrative progression, choices, and challenges tied to game state.
frontend/src/screens/StartScreen.tsx: Displays the title screen with login, new game, load game, and thematic visuals.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL or storage for persistence and security.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, colors, shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, requirements, known issues, and needed image assets for a Ramayan-inspired game.
